metadata.title: CVE-2022-40146 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Batik of Apache XML Graphics allows an attacker to access files using a Jar url. This issue affects Apache XML Graphics Batik 1.14.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40146` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbatik-java - 1.14-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: batik package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.14-2ubuntu0.1').
